Entries.KodaMeeting: Did you see that new boat at the dock?#$b#Must be some interesting folks.
Entries.KodaScram: I had a great time over in that old research ship.$1#$b#I hope FIASA bein' around means some more work for fisherman like me.
Entries.KodaMap: Aye, a lot of that FIASA data went over my head.#$b#But I wanted to support the lass on her big day.

Entries.KodaMeeting: What an interesting vessel pulled up at the harbor!$1#$b#I can't wait to investigate and see what inspiration lies inside.$1
Entries.KodaScram: Call me 'Ahab!'$1#$b#Just kidding, I'm no career seafarer... although visiting that research ship was great inspiration!$1

Entries.KodaMeeting: Have you seen that strange boat down at the harbor?#$b#I wonder what the bubble is for.
Entries.KodaScram: Elliott told me about visiting the research boat at the docks.#$b#He said you were there!$1#$b#If you see anything with artistic potential at the exchange program, will you hold it for me?

Entries.KodaMeeting: My dad is pretty keyed in to the wider science community.#$b#He lets me read his scientific journals and newsletters.$1#$b#Did you know a FIASA resarch boat is coming to town?
Entries.KodaScram2: I hope we didn't make a bad impression with that FIASA officer.#$b#It's hard not to be excited about all those unique tools!$1
It was a pleasant surprise to see you on the FIASA boat, @.$1#$b#I told Robin about the wooden hull and air-tight observation bubble.#$b#She was mad that I didn't think to bring her along.
Entries.KodaMap: That was a wonderful presentation at the Community Center.$1#$b#I do enjoy well-visualized data.#$b#PIE may even donate some equipment!$h

Entries.KodaScram2: I heard all about the FIASA research boat from Demetrius.#$b#Maru seemed taken with it as well.$1#$b#Maybe I'll take Sebastian for our own visit sometime.
Entries.KodaMap: Demetrius and I are both big fans of PIE.$1#$b#They do great work in forestry and habitat restoration.#$b#This is going to be great for the valley!$h

Entries.KodaIsle: Ahh, what a wonderful day!$1#$b#It's migration time for a lot wild creatures.#$b#Even the Giant Turtles are heading out to sea.$1
